pages.text: If there was any town that benefited from its belief, then that was the people of Jonah. When they believed, We removed from them the retribution of disgrace in this worldly life, and We let them enjoy until a time
And had your Lord willed, all the people on the earth in their entirety would have believed. Would you force the people to make them believe
And it is not for a soul to believe except with the permission of God. And He lets taint those who do not comprehend
Say: "Look at all that is in the heavens and the earth." But what good are the signs and warnings to a people who do not believe
Are they waiting for the days like those who have passed away before them? Say: "Wait, for I am with you waiting
Then We will save Our messengers and those who believe. It is thus binding upon Us that We save the believers

Say: "O people, if you are in doubt of my system, then I do not serve those whom you serve besides God. But I serve God; the One who will terminate your lives; and I have been commanded to be of the believers
And set your face to the system of monotheism, and do not be of the polytheists
And do not call upon other than God what does not benefit you or harm you; if you do, then you are of the wicked
